title: What is the meaning of "prendere un oggetto" and "immagine" in Hermetic text of Turba Philosophorum?
first_phrase: In this final part of the text, the author provides instructions for hermetic operations by linking mental states with images. The author also emphasizes the importance of mastering these mental states before proceeding with operational synthesis. The text references the Turba Philosophorum and continues the discussion about the preparation of the Pietra and Fuoco. The author advises readers to review instructions for ritual preparations provided in the previous volume.

last_phrase: To conclude, never cease to keep in mind the importance of mastering both the image and the state to achieve creativity in every hermetic operation. Remember that with persistent practice, uncertain attempts can become automatic obedience to your will. Always make sure to possess the necessary states before proceeding with the operational synthesis. With the right projection and animation, the mind can suddenly realize the vision and achieve a complete detachment and translation into the magical body.
